fundraisingProject.name: Flexible Fundraising Single Web Page
fundraisingProject.description: We're creating a versatile single web page tailored for various fundraising initiatives. Whether it's for hiring talent, launching ad campaigns, or developing cool new features, this app is all about making fundraising engaging and effective!

items.question: Can I use wix to design it?
items.answer: No, you can't. It must be custom-coded.

items.question: How can I contribute?
items.answer: You can contribute by donating through our online platform or participating in our fundraising events.

items.question: Is my donation tax-deductible? What about now
items.answer: Yes, your donation is tax-deductible as we are a registered non-profit organization.

incentives.description: Free mindfulness meditation app subscription for a month
Exclusive access to live online meditation sessions
Complimentary access to a 7-day meditation challenge
Discount on premium meditation music playlists
